content.text:
Here is my analysis of the given business intelligence task:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To analyze technology trends to identify markets for future products or improve sales of existing products:
• Research emerging technologies and assess their potential impact on your industry and target markets. Focus on technologies that could disrupt current products/services or enable new solutions.
• Analyze technology adoption trends among your target customer segments to gauge demand for tech-enabled products and features. Identify which technologies are becoming "must-haves".
• Assess the competitive landscape to determine if competitors are developing products with new technologies, signaling market opportunities or threats.
• Identify underserved market needs that could be met through new technology-powered products or enhancements to existing offerings.
• Develop business cases and market opportunity assessments for the most promising technology applications to aid executive decision-making around product investments.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
